#### Additional Resources

##### Main Textbooks
- **Mitzenmacher & Upfal**: [*Probability and Computing: Randomization and Probabilistic Techniques in Algorithms and Data Analysis*](https://www.cambridge.org/core/books/probability-and-computing/3A5B47DB315FC64B9256C5C8131C5EFA) - Cambridge University Press
- **Motwani & Raghavan**: [*Randomized Algorithms*](https://www.cambridge.org/core/books/randomized-algorithms/6A3E5CD760B0DDBA3794A100EE2843E8) - Cambridge University Press

##### Key Papers
- [Mulmuley, Vazirani & Vazirani: "Matching is as easy as matrix inversion"](https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/BF02579206) - Combinatorica 1987
- [Noam Ta-Shma: "A simple proof of the Isolation Lemma"](https://eccc.weizmann.ac.il/report/2015/080/) - ECCC 2015
- [Koutis & Williams: "Limits and Applications of Group Algebras for Parameterized Problems"](https://link.springer.com/chapter/10.1007/978-3-642-02927-1_54) - ICALP 2009
